titleStmt.title: Mans chief guide to salvation wherein is laid down many good instructions and motives to stir up every poor soul, that he may be able in these sinfull days to withstand Satans assaults / by Thomas Robins.
titleStmt.author: Robins, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages tightly bound with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
